4625.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ|O mankind!|131|149|188$إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|132|120$خَلَقْنَـٰكُم|created you|100|136|5846$مِّن|from|50|86|53$ذَكَرٍ|a male|63|99|3631$وَأُنثَىٰ|and a female|105|123|16012$وَجَعَلْنَـٰكُمْ|and We made you|139|153|10233$شُعُوبًا|nations|79|107|16013$وَقَبَآئِلَ|and tribes|86|114|16014$لِتَعَارَفُوٓاْ‌ۚ|that you may know one another.|238|266|16015$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|84|58$أَكْرَمَكُمْ|(the) most noble of you|178|187|16016$عِندَ|near|56|74|521$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|71|606$أَتْقَـٰكُمْ‌ۚ|(is the) most righteous of you.|224|242|16017$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|88|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|62|184$عَلِيمٌ|(is) All-Knower,|122|354|307$خَبِيرٌ|All-Aware.|88|320|2091$

4626.verse: ۞ قَالَتِ|Say|110|119|2782$ٱلْأَعْرَابُ|the Bedouins,|110|129|7843$ءَامَنَّا‌ۖ|`We believe.`|113|132|78$قُل|Say,|50|69|765$لَّمْ|`Not|51|70|63$تُؤْمِنُواْ|you believe;|101|120|3003$وَلَـٰكِن|but|78|87|108$قُولُوٓاْ|say,|71|86|1233$أَسْلَمْنَا|`We have submitted,`|169|200|16018$وَلَمَّا|and has not yet|126|157|852$يَدْخُلِ|entered|72|103|16019$ٱلْإِيمَـٰنُ|the faith|86|117|15439$فِى|in|48|63|89$قُلُوبِكُمْ‌ۖ|your hearts.|101|108|3135$وَإِن|But if|58|73|213$تُطِيعُواْ|you obey|89|104|3120$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|68|184$وَرَسُولَهُۥ|and His Messenger,|148|163|3790$لَا|not|42|57|30$يَلِتْكُم|He will deprive you|144|152|16020$مِّنْ|of|50|56|53$أَعْمَـٰلِكُمْ|your deeds|95|107|16021$شَيْــًٔا‌ۚ|anything.|82|94|472$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|82|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|65|184$غَفُورٌ|(is) Oft-Forgiving,|139|151|1499$رَّحِيمٌ|Most Merciful.|113|119|1294$

4627.verse: إِنَّمَا|Only|55|62|102$ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ|the believers|113|127|2753$ٱلَّذِينَ|(are) those who|127|141|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|96|84$بِٱللَّهِ|in Allah|67|81|79$وَرَسُولِهِۦ|and His Messenger,|148|162|2497$ثُمَّ|then|50|57|293$لَمْ|(do) not|75|82|63$يَرْتَابُواْ|doubt|88|101|16022$وَجَـٰهَدُواْ|but strive|103|116|1911$بِأَمْوَٲلِهِمْ|with their wealth|132|145|4347$وَأَنفُسِهِمْ|and their lives|113|126|4348$فِى|in|48|61|89$سَبِيلِ|(the) way|86|93|1358$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|(of) Allah.|86|137|2$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|184|51$هُمُ|[they]|62|164|56$ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ|(are) the truthful.|139|190|16023$

4628.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|56|765$أَتُعَلِّمُونَ|`Will you acquaint|141|153|16024$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|65|184$بِدِينِكُمْ|with your religion|133|145|16025$وَٱللَّهُ|while Allah|89|101|167$يَعْلَمُ|knows|61|73|742$مَا|what|53|65|262$فِى|(is) in|58|64|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|128|351$وَمَا|and what|82|108|46$فِى|(is) in|58|84|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۚ|the earth.|92|118|100$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|106|167$بِكُلِّ|of every|75|100|306$شَىْءٍ|thing|69|82|186$عَلِيمٌ|(is) All-Knower.`|130|130|307$

4629.verse: يَمُنُّونَ|They consider (it) a favor|191|199|16026$عَلَيْكَ|to you|71|88|2245$أَنْ|that|48|65|655$أَسْلَمُواْ‌ۖ|they have accepted Islam.|198|215|2712$قُل|Say,|50|67|765$لَّا|`(Do) not|84|92|30$تَمُنُّواْ|consider a favor|127|134|16027$عَلَىَّ|to me -|70|84|4174$إِسْلَـٰمَكُم‌ۖ|your Islam.|95|109|16028$بَلِ|Nay,|50|64|3361$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|67|2323$يَمُنُّ|has conferred a favor|163|177|9544$عَلَيْكُمْ|upon you|81|88|416$أَنْ|that|48|65|655$هَدَٮٰكُمْ|He has guided you|142|176|1609$لِلْإِيمَـٰنِ|to the faith,|101|135|3486$إِن|if|44|78|225$كُنتُمْ|you are|70|104|214$صَـٰدِقِينَ|truthful.|99|116|226$

4630.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|79|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|71|184$يَعْلَمُ|knows|61|79|742$غَيْبَ|(the) unseen|106|124|350$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|150|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۚ|and the earth.|116|134|352$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|90|167$بَصِيرُۢ|(is) All-Seer|99|202|911$بِمَا|of what|71|278|43$تَعْمَلُونَ|you do.`|92|195|725$

4624.verse: O you who have believed, avoid much [negative] assumption. Indeed, some assumption is sin. And do not spy or backbite each other. Would one of you like to eat the flesh of his brother when dead? You would detest it. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Accepting of repentance and Merciful.

4625.verse: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.

4626.verse: The bedouins say, "We have believed." Say, "You have not [yet] believed; but say [instead], 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey Allah and His Messenger, He will not deprive you from your deeds of anything. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."

4627.verse: The believers are only the ones who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and then doubt not but strive with their properties and their lives in the cause of Allah. It is those who are the truthful.

4628.verse: Say, "Would you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah is Knowing of all things?"

4629.verse: They consider it a favor to you that they have accepted Islam. Say, "Do not consider your Islam a favor to me. Rather, Allah has conferred favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if you should be truthful."

4630.verse: Indeed, Allah knows the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.
